title: 多人连线时怎样使用附魔功能（NEI）
author: adds12
txt_content:
MC版本是1.5.2
CodeChickenCore 0.8.7.3.jar
NotEnoughItems 1.5.2.28.jar

我想在我的伺服器中使用NEI中的附魔功能和药水功能(单机时附魔功能没有问题)
可是在多人连线时没有任何反应
怎样解决?

另外,我在单人游戏使用药水功能时
会死game而且有以下字句
 Minecraft has crashed! ---------------------- Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Rendering screen A full error report has been saved to C :\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-10_15.22.05-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :( --- BEGIN ERROR REPORT f5937ab8 -------- Full report at: C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\ crash-reports\crash-2013-07-10_15.22.05-client.txt Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
